name: timao-douyin-live-manager
description: 抖音直播评论实时分析与AI话术生成工具

scripts.dev: npm run kill:ports && concurrently --kill-others --names "SERVICES,RENDERER,ELECTRON" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "npm run services" "npm run dev:renderer" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.dev:full: concurrently --kill-others --names "SERVICES,RENDERER,ELECTRON" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "npm run services" "npm run dev:renderer" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.dev:step3: wait-on http://127.0.0.1:9019/health http://127.0.0.1:10030 && npm run dev:electron
scripts.dev:sequential: npm run dev:step1 && npm run dev:step2 && npm run dev:step3
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && electron-builder --config build-config.json
scripts.build:win: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && electron-builder --win
scripts.build:win64: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.build:win32: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && electron-builder --win --ia32
scripts.build:config: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && electron-builder --config build-config.json --publish=never
scripts.release: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && electron-builder --config build-config.json --publish=never
scripts.clean: rimraf dist && rimraf backend_dist && rimraf electron/renderer/dist
scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.setup:dev: npm ci && cd electron/renderer && npm ci && cd ../.. && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.health:services: curl -f http://127.0.0.1:9019/health && curl -f http://127.0.0.1:9020/health && curl -f http://127.0.0.1:9021/health
scripts.health:all: npm run health:services && npm run health:frontend
scripts.kill:ports: node scripts/kill-port.js 9019 && node scripts/kill-port.js 9020 && node scripts/kill-port.js 9021 && node scripts/kill-port.js 10030
scripts.kill:services: node scripts/kill-port.js 9019 && node scripts/kill-port.js 9020 && node scripts/kill-port.js 9021
scripts.quick:start: concurrently --kill-others --names "SERVICES,RENDERER,ELECTRON" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "npm run services" "npm run dev:renderer" "wait-on http://127.0.0.1:9019/health http://127.0.0.1:10030 && npm run dev:electron"

author: 杭州星炬耀森人工智能科技有限公司提猫直播助手团队
